actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department; OMB.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to prepare and transmit to the Congress a special report on the health care needs of native Hawaiians.
short_title: Native Hawaiian Health Care Needs Act of 1981

summary.text: Native Hawaiian Health Care Needs Act of 1981 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to prepare a report for Congress within one year of enactment of this Act on the physical and mental health care needs of native Hawaiians.

titles.title: Native Hawaiian Health Care Needs Act of 1981
A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to prepare and transmit to the Congress a special report on the health care needs of native Hawaiians.
